data.communities: Talked with Tim Bunce a while ago
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Data::DataFax - a module and its supporting modules to extract,
    process and interact with DataFax system - a fax based remote data
    capture system. See details about DataFax system, please see at
    http://www.datafax.com/.
